item.title: SPK Acquisition Corp S-1
item.description: SPK Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on April 23, 2021 had 47530 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1246 instances combination - 859 instances may - 690 instances shares - 578 instances initial - 486 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
